column1: '''O! Wanderers in the shadowed land''' is a song sung by [[Frodo Baggins]] when walking through the [[Old Forest]]. Its purpose was to encourage the other hobbits to continue on. The trees of the Old Forest did not seem to like the song.<ref>{{FR|I6}}</ref>
''despair not! For though dark they stand
''all woods there be must end at last
''and see the open sun go past: ''
''For east or west all woods must fail... ''
(Frodo's voice faded there leaving the song incomplete)
:The poem is set to music on the [[Tolkien Ensemble]]'s album ''A Night in Rivendell''
* [[Poems in The Lord of the Rings|Poems in ''The Lord of the Rings'']]
